strapiPost.title: Fayetteville Film Fest
strapiPost.content:
Fayetteville Film Fest goes virtual. Returning for its 12th consecutive year, FFF will be providing a verity of films over the course of 10 days. This includes 11 narrative and documentary films, and 30 short films.

  • Info - The FFF continues with their 12 year festival. Online screening will begin November 5 and will run through November 8 with on demand films available for streaming at home through November 14. Friends of the Film pass is $40 or pay what you can to support the event.
  • Deep Dive - you can find more information HERE
